name: Endless Jump - Monster Hop, Sky Jump
name_original: Endless Jump - Monster Hop, Sky Jump
description:
Play this Endless Jump - Monster Hop, Sky Jump is very funny!

Endless Jump - Monster Hop, Sky Jump IS INSANELY ADDICTIVE!

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

In Endless Jump, you guide monster—using some of the pickups—on a springy journey up, up, up a sheet of sky, avoiding black holes, or other obstacles.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

FEATURES:
- funny monster
- broken, moving, disappearing, moveable, and EXPLODING platforms
- JET PACKs, ROCKETS, and springs that fly you higher
- Submit score to Facebook, Twitter
- Compete agains friends!
- Global leaderboards, achievements!
